text: Sweet Hours (Dulces horas) is a 1982 Spanish French drama movie directed by Carlos Saura and starring Iñaki Aierra, Assumpta Serna, Álvaro de Luna, Jacques Lalande, Alicia Hermida, Alicia Sánchez. ==Other websites== * Category:1982 drama movies Category:Spanish drama movies Category:French drama movies Category:Movies directed by Carlos Saura
title: Sweet Hours (Dulces horas)
